awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF TYONEK IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3) BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4) BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5) BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES AND CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATER QUALITY, CLIMATE CHANGE AND SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; DEVELOPING AN EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM; AND SUPPORTING TYONEK TRIBAL CONSERVATION DISTRICT'S SURFACE WATER QUALITY MONITORING PROJECT.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:
THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF TYONEK, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; FINANCIAL REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; AN UPDATED ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY REPORT; AND SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT RECOMMENDATIONS.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
